thread.title: Kristy Sample
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kristy Sample

author: Kristy Sample
title: Kristy Sample
text:
I've bought furniture sight unseen twice now from Gardner White.
Online ordering was very simple and photos were true to the products delivered. A sales associate contacted me shortly after placing my order to confirm everything was correct. Same day delivery is amazing and delivery personnel are also very professional. Tracking my delivery truck online was also very easy and convenient.
As for my furniture, I like it even better than I expected. I'm very happy with my purchases and the overall service that Gardner White provided.
You guys blow Art Van out of the water!
I'll never go anywhere else.
Thank you.
